edu.iu.harp.resource

Class Array<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.resource.Transferable
      • edu.iu.harp.resource.Simple
        • edu.iu.harp.resource.Array<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteArray, DoubleArray, FloatArray, IntArray, LongArray, ShortArray

    public abstract class Array<T>
extends Simple
    The abstract class of arrays. It's used for managing real array data.
